DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this pilot study was to evaluate the effect of D-chiro-Inositol (DCI) oral supplementation in addiction to folic acid compared to folic acid alone on glycaemic control as assessed by HbA1c in overweight or obese T1D patients undergoing intensive insulin therapy. A 24 weeks, prospective, randomized control trial was carried out in T1D patients, aged 17-50 years (13 males, 13 females), with disease duration > 1 year and BMI >25, attending as outpatients the Endocrinology and Diabetes Unit of University Campus Bio-Medico in Rome
DOC.brief_title: D-chiro-Inositol in Overweight Type 1 Diabetes Patients
DOC.criteria: T1D patients aged 1750 years disease duration > 1 year BMI >25 learning disabilities presence of chronic conditions potentially able to influence daily activities (visual or auditory disability, motor impairment for neurological or orthopaedic problems).
